1. © CGI Group Inc. CONFIDENTIAL Visiot, trendit, innovaatiot Tapio Volanen, toimitusjohtaja, CGI Suomi Oy Pekka Horo, toimitusjohtaja, Microsoft Oy

2. In 2017, 1300 in-person client interviews conducted. Purpose: to listen to clients’ perspectives, refine our thinking, inform our investments, and evolve our strategy to lead clients as their partner and expert of choice. 10 industries Insurance Healthcare Oil & Gas Transportation Risk & Investment Intensive 45% Government Manufacturing UtilitiesAsset Intensive 24% Banking Communications Retail & Consumer Consumer Intensive 31% 17 countries CGI’s Voice of Our Clients Business Leaders 40% 60% IT Leaders Responses from prospective clients Source: CGI Voice of Our Clients (2017) 17% @CGI_FI

3. Industry trends with the most impact on organizations

4. Becoming digital to meet customer expectations 4 1 56% Are either in the POC stage or In Process with digitizing customer touchpoints Stage of implementation Source: CGI Voice of Our Clients (2017) @CGI_FI

5. Growing cyber risk 5 2 47% Listed cyber innovation as a top area of investment for 2017 Source: CGI Voice of Our Clients (2017) Where have you invested in innovation over the last year? @CGI_FI

6. Need to respond to regulatory demands 6 3 57% Clients report that data privacy regulations have a high or very high impact on them Source: CGI Voice of Our Clients (2017) To what degree do privacy and data protection laws and in-country data residency regulations have an impact on your organization? @CGI_FI

7. Becoming digital to meet customer expectations rises from #6 to #1 Applying analytics rises from #9 to #3 Business model changes enter Top 10 priorities Changes of priorities in organizations 7 IT Priority Changes New delivery models / Agile Talent challenges Trend Changes Source: CGI Voice of Our Clients (2017) @CGI_FI

8. Invest in innovation 8 Source: CGI Voice of Our Clients (2017) Applying analytics for insight or optimization Becoming digital to meet customer needs Need to modernize 76% 67% 60% Looking ahead to the next 3 years, in which areas does your organization plan to invest in innovation? Nordics respondents @CGI_FI

15. Learn more about How Finland is Embracing Digitalization and download the entire report from Microsoft’s website.

16.
